import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Skills = ({ enterViewPort, exitViewPort }) => { const [currentClass, setCurrentClass] = useState('info') useEffect(() => { if ((enterViewPort > 1 && exitViewPort === 1) || (enterViewPort === 1 && exitViewPort === 2) || enterViewPort === 5) { setCurrentClass('info') } if ((enterViewPort === 2 && exitViewPort === 0) || (enterViewPort === 1 && exitViewPort === 3) || (enterViewPort === 2 && exitViewPort === 2)) { setCurrentClass('current-info') } }, [enterViewPort, exitViewPort]) return (
